## setup

```{r setup}

library(tidyverse)
library(readr)

```

```{r}
KFS <- read_csv("data/AFT-data/KFS_PSHEC_yield_data_validation.csv")
head(KFS)
```

```{r}
data_val <- filter(KFS, Treatment %in% c("T2", "T3", "T4"))
data_val

```

```{r}
write.csv(data_val, "data/AFT-data/filtered_KFS_PSHEC_yield_data_validation.csv")
```

C and N data filtering 

```{r}
KFS_C <- read_csv("data/AFT-data/KFS_C_and_N_data.csv")
head(KFS_C)
```


```{r}
data_val_C <- filter(KFS_C, treatment %in% c("T2", "T3", "T4"))
data_val_C <- data_val_C [ , -c(10:11)]
data_val_C

```


```{r}
write.csv(data_val_C, "data/AFT-data/filtered_KFS_PSHEC_C_data_validation.csv")
```

Bulk Density data filtering 


```{r}
KFS_BD <- read_csv("data/AFT-data/KFS_bulk_density_data.csv")
head(KFS_BD)
```



```{r}
data_val_BD <- filter(KFS_BD, treatment %in% c("T2", "T3", "T4"))
data_val_BD <- data_val_BD [ , -c(11)]
data_val_BD
unique(data_val_BD$treatment)
```



```{r}
write.csv(data_val_BD, "data/AFT-data/filtered_KFS_PSHEC_Bulk_density_data_validation.csv")
```
